channel.title: Whonix-Gateway-CLI with Whonix-Workstation-XFCE
channel.description:
is it possible to use the whonix-gateway-cli with the whonix-workstation-xfce without using the xfce-gateway. will it work the same, any draw backs? is it as simple as downloading both the cli-gateway and the xfce-workstation and running the same as you would with the xfce workstation.
Can i use the whonix cli gateway with the whonix xfce work station, if so is there any set up i need to do or do i just need to download the cli gateway and run it with the xfce workstation?

item.title: Whonix-Gateway-CLI with Whonix-Workstation-XFCE
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Quote Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS, Linux inside VirtualBox

Can I combine Whonix-Gateway ™ CLI with Whonix-Workstation ™ XFCE? Yes! [archive]
